sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { StudentService } from 'src/app/shared/student.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-studentsummary', templateUrl: './studentsummary.component.html', styleUrls: [] }) export class StudentsummaryComponent implements OnInit{ ProfileImg : string = '../../../assets/image/ProfilePicture.png'; constructor(public studentSvc:StudentService){} ngOnInit(): void { } }
